Posts.Content: How does one repair their life after cancer ? very scared of meeting the opposite sex now. the brest cancer has given me a complex. even tho people say be grateful to still be here I am but i want more out of life . i feel empty . does anyone else feel the same dollybean
Posts.Title: after the cancer what next

Posts.Content: Hi Jan Yes you were bang on I SEEM TO KEEP IN MY SAFTY ZONE WORK AND HOME LIFE just cant seem to go behond that . I give enough of myself working in an old peoples home so i have NO more to give. I just wish their was someone who could give to me. I dont want to sound selfish but after all my cancer and looking after 3 boys . I WOULD LIKE SOMTHING MORE . and its not happening thats why i get so down dollybean
Posts.Title: after the cancer what next
